validate.cmpsEmptyMsg: 流程构件不允许为空，请联系表单开发确认问题
validate.directNoPf: 启动方式为【直接】的流程不应该包含共享（PF）的流程构件
validate.directNoPfMsg: 请移除以下共享（PF）的流程构件：
validate.noLoadDataCmp: 缺少执行时机为[获取数据]的流程构件
validate.noLoadDataCmpMsg: 流程定义不能缺少取数构件，请联系表单开发确认问题
validate.noStartCmp: 缺少执行时机为[流程启动]的流程构件
validate.noStartCmpMsg: 会导致流程启动时无法修改单据状态，请联系表单开发确认问题
validate.lackProcessCompleteCmp: 缺少执行时机为[流程完成]的流程构件
validate.lackProcessCompleteCmpMsg: 会导致流程完成时无法修改单据状态，请联系表单开发确认问题
validate.lackProcessAbortCmp: 缺少执行时机为[流程终止]的流程构件
validate.lackProcessAbortCmpMsg: 会导致流程终止时无法修改单据状态，请联系表单开发确认问题
validate.lackProcessCancelCmp: 缺少执行时机为[流程终止]的流程构件
validate.lackProcessCancelCmpMsg: 会导致流程终止时无法修改单据状态，请联系表单开发确认问题
validate.lackProcessBackCmp: 缺少执行时机为[流程驳回]的流程构件
validate.lackProcessBackCmpMsg: 会导致流程驳回时无法修改单据状态，请联系表单开发确认问题
validate.lackProcessReStartCmp: 缺少执行时机为[重新提交]的流程构件
validate.lackProcessReStartCmpMsg: 会导致流程重新提交时无法修改单据状态，请联系表单开发确认问题
validate.parallelGatewayCheckMsg: 【并行网关】需作为一条流程分支的拆分节点和汇聚节点成对出现，请修改
validate.noVariable1: 活动【变量设置】属性中已设置变量
validate.noVariable2: 在流程属性【流程变量】中已不存在，请修改！
validate.noFlowNodeChsName: 】的活动简体中文名称为空，请修改
validate.nameExceedsLengthLimit: 】的名称超长，不能超过40个字符，请修改

processEditor.noDtInfo: 不存在设计时流程信息！请先赋值！
processEditor.noRtInfo: 不存在运行时流程信息！请先赋值！
processEditor.waitReview: 保存成功，等待发起审核
processEditor.policyConflict: 会签策略下,“驳回规则”不允许“动态选择驳回级次”，请修改！
processEditor.noPermissionToSave: 当前用户不具备另存流程的权限
processEditor.closeProc2: 系统可能不会保存您所做的更改。
processEditor.copied: 模型已经复制到剪贴板

wfProcessCell.name: 名称
wfProcessCell.directTips: 提示：启动方式切换为直接，直接启动是默认的流程启动方式，切换后会移除共享(PF)相关构件，请知悉！
wfProcessCell.externalTips: 提示：启动方式切换为外部流程，适用于作为共享流程的外部流程相关场景，切换后保留流程上的共享（PF)相关构件，请知悉！
wfProcessCell.subprocessTips: 提示：启动方式切换为子流程，适用于调用式子流程的场景，切换后会移除除取数构件外的其他流程构件，请知悉！

processDesigner.collectionElementVariable: 多实例子活动元素变量
processDesigner.subCollectionElementVariable: 多实例子流程元素变量
processDesigner.nrOfActiveInstances: 多实例正在运行中的数量
processDesigner.conclusionTypeTips: 审批项流转方向，1正向，2反向，3终止
processDesigner.saveAsFail: 另存为失败，请检查流程是否正确！
processDesigner.syncDt: 是否将当前版本流程定义同步到设计时流程定义包
processDesigner.beforeCompleteStrategyChange: 当前节点存在运行中的活动实例，不允许调整完成策略，请了解！
processDesigner.creation: 通过生单流程生成目标单

multiInstanceLoopCharacteristics.promptAct1: 1、[集合]中的元素个数为子活动启动实例数量。
multiInstanceLoopCharacteristics.promptAct2: 2、子活动启动时系统会将[集合]中的元素拆分映射到各个子活动实例的[元素变量]。
multiInstanceLoopCharacteristics.promptProc1: 1、[集合]中的元素个数为子流程启动实例数量。
multiInstanceLoopCharacteristics.promptProc2: 2、子流程启动时系统会将[集合]中的元素拆分映射到各个子流程实例的[元素变量]。
multiInstanceLoopCharacteristics.checkPrompt: 当前节点存在运行中的活动实例，不允许调整

smsMessageTemplate.smsTemplateContent: 第三方短信服务商里定义的模板原文，例如:阿里云您的管控大数据平台账号已开通,用户名为:${username}，初始密码为:${code}，请及时登录系统

processEditor.noRtInfo: No runtime process information exists! Please assign it first!

wfProcessCell.name: Name
wfProcessCell.directTips: Tip: Switching start mode to 'Direct' will remove shared (PF) related components as it is the default start mode. Please be aware of this!
wfProcessCell.externalTips: Tip: Switching start mode to 'External Process' is suitable for scenarios where the process serves as an external process for sharing. After switching, shared (PF) related components on the process will be retained. Please be aware of this!
wfProcessCell.subprocessTips: Tip: Switching start mode to 'Subprocess' is suitable for invoking sub-processes. After switching, all process components except those for data extraction will be removed. Please be aware of this!

processDesigner.nrOfActiveInstances: The number of multiple instances running
processDesigner.conclusionTypeTips: The direction of item circulation, 1 for forward, 2 for backward, 3 for termination

processDesigner.syncDt: Whether to synchronize the current version of the process definition to the design-time process definition package
processDesigner.beforeCompleteStrategyChange: There are running activity instances in the current node, adjusting the completion strategy is not allowed, please be aware!
processDesigner.creation: Generate the target form through the form generation process

multiInstanceLoopCharacteristics.promptProc2: 2. When the sub-process starts, the system will split and map the elements in the [Collection] to the [Element Variables] of each sub-process instance.

backwardRule.reEdit: The rejected activity node no longer exists. Please re-edit.
backwardRule.name: Name
backwardRule.popover: 1. Sequential Transition: Transition according to the order of the flow lines; 2. Return to Me: If the completion strategy is Preemptive, only create tasks for the person who rejected it. If the completion strategy is Countersignature, the person who rejected it and the unapproved person will receive new tasks, and the approved personnel will automatically approve them; 3. Return to Current Node: The actual effect is affected by the option 'Is the executor a person who has already processed the node when entering the node again'
backwardRule.selectAbleClick: Under the Countersignature strategy, dynamic selection of rejection target nodes is not allowed!
backwardRule.dictPicked: Please use the 'Revert to Empty' option with the 'Allow dynamic selection of rejection target nodes' option
backwardRule.defaultPrompt: All historical rejection nodes are selected by default
backwardRule.title: Activity List
backwardRule.dynamicSelection: Allow dynamic selection of rejection target nodes
backwardRule.popover1: 1. Sequential Transition: Transition according to the order of the flow lines;
backwardRule.popover2: 2. Return to Me: If the completion strategy is Preemptive, only create tasks for the person who rejected it. If the completion strategy is Countersignature, the person who rejected it and the unapproved person will receive new tasks, and the approved personnel will automatically approve them;
backwardRule.popover3: 3. Return to Current Node: The actual effect is affected by the option 'Is the executor a person who has already processed the node when entering the node again'

wfProcessCell.name: 名稱
wfProcessCell.directTips: 提示：啟動方式切換為直接，直接啟動是默認的流程啟動方式，切換後會移除共享(PF)相關構件，請知悉！
wfProcessCell.externalTips: 提示：啟動方式切換為外部流程，適用於作為共享流程的外部流程相關場景，切換後保留流程上的共享（PF)相關構件，請知悉！
wfProcessCell.subprocessTips: 提示：啟動方式切換為子流程，適用於調用式子流程的場景，切換後會移除除取數構件外的其他流程構件，請知悉！
